Uses of Package
com.accele.gage

  • Packages that use com.accele.gage 
    Package Description
    com.accele.gage
    Contains the core components of the General Abstracted Game Engine.
    com.accele.gage.callbacks
    Contains callback interfaces used with various classes throughout GAGE.
    com.accele.gage.config
    Contains classes used to modify and retrieve global engine settings as well as user-defined settings.
    com.accele.gage.control
    Contains classes for receiving input from the user, primarily involving mouse and keyboard support.
    com.accele.gage.entity
    Contains classes for creating and handling in-game entities.
    com.accele.gage.gfx
    Contains classes used to display graphics to the screen.
    com.accele.gage.log
    Contains classes used to display information about the engine and its implementation.
    com.accele.gage.sfx
    Contains classes required to play sounds.
    com.accele.gage.state
    Contains classes used for creating and maintaining game state implementations.
    com.accele.gage.tile
    Contains classes used to create 2D tiled textures of a fixed-size width and height.
  • Classes in com.accele.gage used by com.accele.gage 
    Class Description
    Cleanable
    Allows an object to perform any necessary cleanup tasks before being deallocated.
    GAGE
    The primary class for interfacing with the engine.
    GAGEException
    Indicates that an exception has occurred in relation to GAGE.
    GameConfiguration
    The primary settings for the engine.
    Indexable
    An engine object with a unique registry identifier.
    Registry
    A general-purpose storage class for engine resources.
    ResourceLoader
    Represents a way to retrieve data for a particular Resource.
    ResourceLocation
    A class describing the location of a particular Resource.
  • Classes in com.accele.gage used by com.accele.gage.callbacks 
    Class Description
    Indexable
    An engine object with a unique registry identifier.
  • Classes in com.accele.gage used by com.accele.gage.config 
    Class Description
    GAGEException
    Indicates that an exception has occurred in relation to GAGE.
    Indexable
    An engine object with a unique registry identifier.
    Resource
    An engine-specific resource used by various components throughout the engine.
